title: HiTek Sunglasses
info: The HiTek Sunglasses are a Hardmode, post-Golem vanity item for the social helmet slot. They are similar to the Sunglasses and Goggles, in that they provide eye graphics without concealing the player's hair. HiTek Sunglasses are purchased from the Cyborg for 5, after at least one Martian Madness event has been defeated.
